catalog_info.title: Biochemistry and Biology of Neurodegenerative Diseases
catalog_info.notes: Course meets September 14, 2015 through October 26, 2015. Expected to be given in the first quarter of the fall term of 2015-2016.
catalog_info.description: Biochemistry and biology are integrated to provide a broad perspective on major human neurodegenerative diseases. The biochemistry, enzymology, structural biology and pathology of disease-associated proteins and approaches to developing therapeutics will be examined.
